topic.title: List of Tables and List of Figures

body.p:
To activate these:
The map must be a DITA bookmap.
There must be a figurelist or tablelist in the frontmatter or backmatter. In the following example we add both of the lists just after the table of contents (the toc element is the placeholder where the table of contents will be created): <frontmatter> <booklists> <toc/> <figurelist/> <tablelist/> </booklists> </frontmatter>
